de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt
Class BTInternStatistic

java.lang.Object
  de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt.BTInternStatistic

public class BTInternStatistic
extends java.lang.Object

This class stores the statistic data in the clients. The client has to have access to these data for different algorithms.

Author:
Jan Stolzenburg

startDownload

public void startDownload()
Store the time of the download start.

stopDownload

public void stopDownload()
Store the time of the download stop. In most cases, the client has finished the download, when it stops.

getDownloadStatisticForPeer

public java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getDownloadStatisticForPeer(BTContact thePeer)
Returns the statistic for the block that the current peer received from the given peer.

Parameters:
thePeer - the peer how uploaded the data to us.
Returns:
the list of the times at which we received a block from that peer.

getUploadStatisticForPeer

public java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getUploadStatisticForPeer(BTContact thePeer)
Returns the statistic for the block that the current peer send to the given peer.

Parameters:
thePeer - the peer how downloaded the data from us.
Returns:
the list of the times at which we send a block to that peer.
